__e: Well, you know, my friend the Sultan of Brunei is so hard to pin down.
At least we don't have harems.
Our great Sultan asks whether you know, young man, that seventeen princes...
My brother the Sultan has found a way.
The princess is on her way for her first trip to America and the sultan has indicated to us that it would please him if we saw to it that she had a good time while she was here.
